title: not getting key frags
body: I was honor locked for awhile an unable to get rewards. I have been unlocked for 20+ games without getting a single key fragment. seems a bit odd

replies.body: Your loot was unlocked, but it looks like you're still at Honor rank 0. Rank 1 gives fewer key fragments, and 0 doesn't give any at all. You'll have to work towards an honorable rank again to start getting those rewards.

Hm that's weird. Remember that you unlocked from getting rewards doesn't mean that you'll 100% get a reward. You still have to play with sportsmanship to earn a key fragment. Remember that those are not free, you have to earn it yourself. I have changed myself, and I'm like the most chill-prove player in the world right now. Maybe you should start to encourage your teammates, and stop them if you see any of the flamings going on. Right now for me, I'm getting a good amount of keys, but not chests... I main tanks so S are so hard to get RIP.  
Just keep playing nicely, remember you are not playing nice for the key fragments, but for yourself and your teammates. Then I'm pretty sure one day you'll become like me one day xd. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
